attributes.action: Stop the Government from being so arrogant, take their heads out of their backsides and actually listen to and learn from the public on matters affecting this country - You're not always right.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: All you have to do is listen to any minister - they all think they are right with what they are doing and refuse to take heed of any opinions from the public over matters like justice, immigration, Europe, NHS and various other matters.  We live day to day in the real world, on the front line of it all and are getting fed up with the nanny state and liberal policies that undermine every hard working and law abiding citizen in England.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
